plot outline: Wealthy Abhijeet Deshmukh and his four slacker friends, Ranjan, Popat and Mani, after cheating in their exams, get into a gambling debt of fifty thousand Rupees, and end up stealing from Abhijeet's dad's (Mahesh) safe. Mahesh subsequently finds out and asks them to return the money or else he will file a police complaint. A few days later the Police show up in the Deshmukh residence - not to arrest the foursome for Theft - but for allegedly sexually molesting a gorgeous young woman by the name of Nisha.
title: Aaila Re!!
